properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
STRAIT OF SICILY.
LINOSA TO LAMPEDUSA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
SEVEN METER VESSEL, EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD,
OVERDUE LINOSA (35-52-12N 012-52-12E)
TO LAMPEDUSA (35-30-00N 012-36-00E).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
